Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Agendas & Minutes](http://www.keenetx.com/AgendaCenter)

   Access easily searchable meeting agendas and minutes for various boards, commissions, and committees.
2. #### [Boards & Commissions](http://www.keenetx.com/191/Boards-Commissions)

   Discover information about the local boards and commissions that make important decisions to keep the City of Keene running smoothly.
3. #### [City Charter (PDF)](http://www.keenetx.com/DocumentCenter/View/167/City-of-Keene-City-Charter-PDF)

   Read through the City of Keene City Charter.
4. #### [City Council](http://www.keenetx.com/183/City-Council)

   The City Council is responsible for establishing city policies, considering city resolutions and ordinances, appointing citizens to various city boards and commissions, adopting the city's Master Plan and annual budget, and approving or rejecting requested zoning changes.
5. #### [Code of Ordinances](https://library.municode.com/tx/keene/codes/code_of_ordinances)

   Code of Ordinances
6. #### [Election Information](https://www.keenetx.com/213/Elections)
